prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a colossal, massive humanoid warrior, light lavender/pale purple skin, sharp black mohawk and long braid, stoic expression, wide jawline, thick muscular neck, wearing brown vest
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, extreme muscle definition, detailed biological skin texture, volumetric rim lighting, subtle sheen on the skin, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, CGI, plastic texture, smooth skin, helmet, flat lighting, low quality, deformed anatomy, blurry hair, unrealistic proportions
